objects.text:
• Classic Retro Design
• Advanced X-Trans Sensor
• Electronic Viewfinder
• X-Mount Lens Compatible

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Mirrorless Digital Camera - Professional Photography Made Accessible
product_details.description:
• Classic retro-styled compact mirrorless camera design
• Advanced X-Trans CMOS II sensor for exceptional image quality
• High-precision electronic viewfinder with real-time preview
• Multiple manual control dials for quick settings adjustment
• Compatible with Fujifilm's renowned X-mount lens system
• Built-in Wi-Fi connectivity for easy photo sharing
• Advanced autofocus system with multiple focus points
• Tiltable LCD screen for flexible shooting angles
• Film simulation modes to recreate classic Fujifilm looks
• Compact and lightweight body ideal for travel photography
• Full HD video recording capabilities
• Durable metal construction with ergonomic grip

banner_details:
This banner features a dual-tone layout divided into four quadrants, using an elegant blend of deep navy blue and vibrant red tones. The top-left quadrant contains a bold, white sans-serif text layer ("heading") paired with a striking red subheading ("subheading"). A catchy promotional phrase follows beneath, split across the "tagline" and "offer" text layers. The top-right showcases a high-resolution camera image ("product_image") that dominates visual focus. The bottom-left quadrant details key product features in "description", a large white price tag ("price"), and a red rectangular "SHOP NOW" button made with "cta_button" and "cta". The bottom-right quadrant has motivational messaging ("motivation_text") and a sense-of-urgency phrase ("urgency_text") over a contrasting red background.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Navy Blue: `#0F3460`
- Midnight Blue: `#16213E`
- Dark Slate Blue: `#1A1A2E`
- Coral Red: `#E94560`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a Fujifilm X-T10 camera with a sleek, modern design dominated by deep matte black (#1A1A1A), providing a professional and high-end aesthetic. Accents of white (#FFFFFF) are used on text and dials for sharp contrast and readability, while subtle metallic grays (#4F4F4F) enhance depth across the lens and body. Small orange (#FFA500) markings on the lens offer subtle highlights, adding vibrancy to the composition. The lens glass features reflective green-blue hints (#6FC3B9), adding visual intricacy. These colors are harmoniously blended with well-defined edges to ensure each tone stands out, making it ideal for a sophisticated advertisement palette.
